# Business Context (for LLM understanding)

## About King of Spreads
King of Spreads is a business in the food and baking supplies industry.

## Target Audience
- Home Baking Enthusiasts
- Professional Bakers and Pastry Chefs
- Baking Instructors and Schools
- Small Event Caterers

## Industry
food and baking supplies
